title: Solitary Confinement at Rikers
teaser: We talk to New York magazine's Jennifer Gonnerman about her piece that tells the story of Kalief Browder, a 16-year-old who was held at Rikers Island prison for more than 1,000 days without trial.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
